app_descript:
Borderline Personality Test

Explore your emotional health with the Borderline Personality Test, designed to help you better understand symptoms associated with Borderline Personality Disorder (BPD). Aimed at providing insights into your mental health, this app features an engaging, user-friendly interface that guides you through a series of essential questions.

ğŸ“Œ Core Features

  • Simple Screening: Utilize the Maclean Screening Instrument for BPD, consisting of 10 yes or no questions to assess your symptoms. ğŸ“
  • Educational Insights: Learn about Borderline Personality Disorder, its symptoms, and its relation to other mental health issues like depression and anxiety. ğŸ“š
  • User-Friendly Interface: Navigate through the test with ease thanks to an intuitive design, ensuring a smooth user experience. ğŸŒŸ
  • Resource Guidance: Receive reminders that professional diagnosis should be sought from qualified healthcare professionals. ğŸš‘
  • Privacy Focused: Your test results are confidential, providing you peace of mind as you navigate your mental health journey. ğŸ”’
